title: iPhone 6S Plus / 6 Plus Glass Screen Protector, 2-Pack, Real Gorilla Glass, Super Strong Premium Quality Glass by Corning, Crystal Clear, Hardness 9H, Thickness 0.33 mm, Complete Kit, Easy to Apply
description: MAXIMUM PROTECTION: ShieldTech i-EX Strengthened Glass Screen Protectors are fortified on a molecular level by an ion-exchange process, making them stronger than other types of screen protector glass.

ULTRA THIN: Because the glass is only 0,33mm thin, you can operate your phone exactly the same way you are used to, as if the glass screen protector isn't even there. The smooth beveled edge design assures a natural feel.

CRYSTAL CLEAR: The flawless clarity of the tempered glass screen protector compliments the original design of your iPhone and makes it almost invisible. It is also equipped with an anti-fingerprint coating.

EASY TO APPLY: Application of the screen protector is effortless. Everything you need to attach the screen protector without any air bubbles, dust, scratches, smears or sticky residue, is included in this kit.

DURABLE: After the tempered glass screen protector is attached, it will not budge. The glass screen protector will not fade, scratch or shatter. There will also be no fingerprints or rainbow effect on the glass.

title: PECHAM Bluetooth Headphones CSR4.0 Wireless Sport Stereo In-Ear Noise Cancelling Sweatproof Headset with Mic for iPhone, Samsung and Android Phones, Black
description: With advanced Bluetooth 4.0 and apt-X technology, PECHAM S5 headphones provide high-fidelity stereo music and clear speech within 10 meters. It offers a perfect balance of bass and treble whatever music genre you are listening to.

The headphones are ergonomically designed, lightweight, with flexible neckband and invisible nano-coating technology, which protect them against sweat during running and workouts. Included 3 pairs of soft silicone rubber earplugs in different sizes make this headphone fit for people's particular anatomy and block outside noise very well.

The simple user interface on the right side earphones allows you adjust the volume, play/pause, select songs and answer/hang up calls effortlessly. The behind-the-neck style prevents it from hitting the ground even if they fall out of your ears, the best training partner you ever have.

Compatible with iphone 6/6s/6 plus/6s plus/5/5c/5s/4s, iPad Air, Samsung Galaxy S6, S5, S4, S3, HTC M9 M8 M7, LG Flex 2 G3 G2, and more Bluetooth-enabled Smartphones. Built-in with rechargeable Grade A polymer large capacity battery, PECHAM S5 headphones can last up to 8 hours talking time or 6 hours music time, never worry about it running out if juice

High Quality Guarantee: High tech materials are adopted to maintain comfort, durability and hygiene. Unique flexible sweatproof design ensure you get it perfect fit and remain stable during outdoor activities and workouts.
